metadata.title: CVE-2020-15668 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: A lock was missing when accessing a data structure and importing certificate information into the trust database. This vulnerability affects Firefox < 80 and Firefox for Android < 80.

notes.note: tyhicks> mozjs contains a copy of the SpiderMonkey JavaScript engine

criterions.comment: firefox package in hirsute was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '80.0.1+build1-0ubuntu1').
